price: Those who are in awe for fear of their Lord[26],
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ
footnotes: [26] In spite of their faith and righteousness, they are in awe of their Lord.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
